title: Crime Alert 05.10.19
itunes:title: Crime Alert 05.10.19
description:
Man who fatally shot and killed five people and injured six more reportedly was not taken seriously when he told employees he was going to kill them all.  Actor Vince Vaugh pleads no contest to an alcohol related reckless driving charge.  A husband shoots his wife of 47-years, in what his family calls a mercy killing.   

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
